short_description: True Anti-Sag System: Features a hand-pull tensioner integrated directly into the poles. Just a gentle pull tightens the net and locks it securely in place—no sagging, no slipping. Rock-Solid Stability: Built with thickened aluminum poles that resist bending. This set includes two bonus heavy-duty pole bases and 7cm metal ground stakes to anchor the guy lines firmly. The result is unshakable stability—your net will not wobble or fall, even in strong winds

Complete Set, Ready to Play: Includes everything you need: a 20ft tournament net, 4 premium rackets, 4 durable nylon shuttlecocks, and a high-quality carry bag. Simply unbox the set and start playing in your backyard within minutes

short_description: Heavy-Duty Outdoor Performance! Our badminton & volleyball net features 600D Oxford sleeves built for relentless anti-aging, UV-resistant.
